channel.title: Client colors
channel.description:
does anybody have a client colors list??
because i have a file in this client im using called how to recolor items
and heres what it says
[code]Where it says: class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6073;
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61; Is the original item color and
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6073; is the new color (my lava color)[/code]
so idk how to get a color
does anybody?

item.title: Client colors
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

what??

im a noob please explain more…
I’m trying to learn more about clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Client colors
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

anIntArray156 needs to be examined for the item you’re changing. That one must always be left the same.
To get colors for anIntArray160, use have it use System.out.println to display the color.

Read full topic
